DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine : ( 1 ) whether laparoscopy-assisted nerve-preserved total mesorectal excision ( LNTME ) safe open TME rectal cancer , ( 2 ) whether LNTME effective protection pelvic autonomic nerve function surgical impairing compare open TME .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Evaluate Laparoscopy-assisted Nerve-preserved Total Mesorectal Excision ( LNTME ) Versus Open TME Rectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male patient 2 . From 18 year old 60 year old 3 . Normal sexual function 4 . Tumor locate rectum ( define 5 12cm anal verge ) 5 . Pathological confirm rectal cancer 6 . Preoperative T stage range T1 T4a accord 7th Edition AJCC Cancer Staging Manual 7 . Tumor size < 5 cm 8 . ASA score III 9 . Informed consent write 1 . Distant cancer metastasis 2 . History abdominal surgery 3 . With type malignancy 4 . Preoperative void dysfunction 5 . Preoperative sexual dysfunction 6 . Refusing attend trial
